title: [Question]: Pes RR campus cse through jee or pes EC campus through kcet or lower IIIT's like IIIT Sricity or IIIT Raichur? pls help on making a decision

comments.body: pes ec campus cse through kcet its a no brainer
pes ec through kcet , you will save A lot of money. just 1.15 L tuition fee.
